article_title: Five Questions Our Next President Should Answer About Healthcare

article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.

og.description: With fewer than 100 days until the first primaries, the leading candidates have received ample air time to address the important issues our nation faces. But even though healthcare accounts for around 18% of our nation's GDP and consumes close to half of the total tax revenue collected by the federal government, their silence on providing solutions to the most pressing healthcare challenges our nation faces continues with few exceptions.
